lead_paragraph: Narges Mohammadi, one of the best-known activists remaining in Iran, has worked with the Defenders of Human Rights Center.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Rights Advocate Is Arrested

snippet: Narges Mohammadi, one of the best-known activists remaining in Iran, has worked with the Defenders of Human Rights Center.
abstract: Baharnews reports human rights activist Narges Mohammadi was arrested by Iranian security forces.
